input: How can I avoid nailing my thumb when starting a nail with a hammer?
options: Use a hair comb, put the nail in the teeth of the comb deep enough to hold solidly, then hold the nail in its location with one hand and hammer the nail in with the other.

input: How to cut out your base?
options: Use compass to cut out the base and lid of the brain canister. Cut a 12" diameter circle from both.  Cut it out with a hand saw.
